about_the_game:
Rage of Fluffy Looters is a tower defense game where you play as a cat who must himself from endless waves of monsters for as long as possible. Use your camera and various towers to fend off the invaders and collect resources to enhance your defenses.

You can choose from different types of towers, each with its abilities and tactical purposes. Some towers shoot projectiles, some slow down enemies, some throw bombs that explode on contact, and more. Be careful, the monsters are not easy to defeat. They have different strengths, weaknesses, and behaviors. Some are fast, some are tough, some are sneaky, and some are slightly more physically developed than others.

Rage of Fluffy Looters is a game that will challenge your strategy and reflexes. You will need to plan ahead, place your towers wisely, and use your tactical instincts to survive.

Key features

  • Endless waves of enemies with different difficulties
  • 7 types of towers
  • Dozens of different monsters
  • Cute graphics
  • Global leaderboards
  • All the game content is available right away

If you like tower defense games and cats, you will love Rage of Fluffy Looters. Download it now and unleash your furry rage! 🐱

name: Rage of Fluffy Looters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 134 MB available space

short_description: The ultimate mash-up of Reversed Bullet Hell and Tower Defense! Rage of Fluffy Looters is a game where you play as a cat and must fight off hordes of monsters with your towers. Protect your fur and unleash your furious rage! 🐱
